attributes.additional_details: In February 2010, you appointed Counselling and Health Psychologist Dr. Linda Papadopoulos, to conduct research into the sexualization of young people.  After extensive research, in her review, Dr. Linda Papadopoulos, made several recommendations.  I believe, that after a year of these proposals, in which, You the Goverment stated that you would intervene, have not met these recommendations.
